Shop with eBay at Katy MillsIMAGE IMAGE IMAGE We believe that people are basically good We believe that everyone has something to contribute eBay Community Values IMAGE eBays Commitment eBay created Auction for America in response to the national crisis and a call for support from New York Governor George Patak i and New York City Mayor Rudolph Giuliani The eBay Foundation donated th e first million to the effort of all proceeds will benefit S eptember th Fund Twin Towers Fund The New York State World Trade Center Relief Fund American Red Cross Join eBay at the Katy Mills Mall Visit eBay at Katy Mills between October and learn how you can suppor t Auction for America benefiting the September th Fund the America n Red Cross the Twin Towers Fund and the New York State World Trade Cente r Relief Fund Well show you how to Buy an Auction for America item Make a donation List and sell Auction for America items Where Katy Mills Katy Mills Circle Katy TX When Friday Oct am pm Saturday Oct ampm Sunday Oct ampm IMAGE IMAGE Click on a button below to participate IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE Participating companies IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE First Data Merchant Services IMAGE To facilitate the smooth transaction of funds sellers must offer eBay Onlin e Payments by Billpoint Instant Purchase on Auction for America listings Sellers are responsible for shipping charges on all Auction for America it ems Please note that seller tools such as Mister Lister and Sellers Assi stant do not currently support Auction for America to list an item pleas e use the Sell Your Item form
